title: Solution for Education: Increase community participation in local government by getting social workers to educate their clients on local government
explanation: Specifically, low income communities where voter turnout is extremely low.  Having caseworkers and social workers edcuating clients will empower the community, help combat the psychological effects of learned helplessness, get community members more invested in their community, and increase voter turnout.
solution: Increase community participation in local government by getting social workers to educate their clients on local government
